DOC.detailed_description: STUDY BACKGROUND / RATIONALE / PURPOSE : There still little known health effect vaping electronic cigarette . Some former study investigate short term effect vaping regard lung function , respiratory resistance FeNO ( fractional exhale nitric oxide ) . Flouris et al. , 2013 find significant short term effect conventional lung function parameter . Vardavas et al. , 2012 also find short term effect conventional lung function parameter , increase respiratory resistance decrease FeNO . In contrast , Schober et al. , 2014 observe increase FeNO vaping electronic cigarette . Experimental study show , electronic cigarette induce inflammatory process epithelial cell ( Lerner et al. , 2015 ; Wu , Jiang , Minor , Chu , 2014 ) . Lim Kim , 2014 investigated effect e-liquids airway reactivity inflammation allergic sensitized mouse . Reactivity inflammation get bad . Long term data still miss . For purpose want investigate lung function , airway reactivity , health status smoking/vaping behaviour smoker time intend start vaping 3 month .
